div.div: Luxembourg Annual Declaration preview : Return for year

tr.td: Average number of employees for the fiscal year
Phone number for contacting the declaring person
Annual accounts submitted to the Trade and Companies Register (RCS)
Supply of goods not manufactured inhouse
Net profit margin (special arrangement: Art. 56ter-1 and 56ter-2)
Disposal of tangible and intangible capital assets for ancillary transactions
Application of goods for private use or for that of the staff (008)
Application for the purpose of business of goods produced in the course of the business (009)
Use of goods considered business assets for purposes other than those of the business (010)
Supply of services carried out free of charge for purposes other than those of the business (011)
IC supply of goods to persons identified for VAT purposes in another Member State (MS)
Manufactured tobacco whose VAT was collected at the source or at the exit of the tax warehouse together with excise duties
Supply, subsequent to intra-Community acquisitions of goods, in the context of triangular transactions
IC supply of new means of transport (Art. 43(1)(e)) to persons not identified for VAT purposes who are established or reside in an other MS (202)
Supply of goods carried out to customers not identified for VAT purposes and established in the MS where the dispatch ends, when these supplies are taxable in that MS
Acquisitions, in the context of triangular transactions
Made for a subsequent supply to a customer identified for VAT purposes in the MS of destination of the goods
Importation of goods for business purposes
Importation of goods for non-business purposes
Supply of services for which the customer is liable for the payment of VAT
Provided to the declaring person by suppliers not established or residing within the Community
Provided to the declaring person by suppliers established within the territory
Supply of goods for which the purchaser is liable for the payment of VAT
(to be carried forward to point IV.A)
1. Total of VAT on stock entries
a) VAT invoiced by other taxable persons for goods or services supplied
b) VAT due in respect of intra-Community acquisitions of goods other than manufactured tobacco
c) VAT due or paid in respect of importations of goods other than manufactured tobacco and goods for non-business purposes
d) VAT due under the reverse charge
2. Total of VAT on capital expenditures
a) VAT invoiced by other taxable persons for goods or services supplied
b) VAT due in respect of intra-Community acquisitions of goods other than manufactured tobacco
c) VAT due or paid in respect of importations of goods other than manufactured tobacco and goods for non-business purposes
d) VAT due under the reverse charge
3. Total of VAT on operational expenditures
a) VAT invoiced by other taxable persons for goods or services supplied
b) VAT due in respect of intra-Community acquisitions of goods other than manufactured tobacco
c) VAT due or paid in respect of importations of goods other than manufactured tobacco and goods for non-business purposes
d) VAT due under the reverse charge
a) Tax due in respect of the application of goods for business purposes as referred to in Art. 13(b)
b) Tax paid as joint and several guarantee in accordance with the conditions laid down in Art. 48
c) Adjusted tax - special arrangement for tax suspension
Non recoverable input tax relating to supplies exempt pursuant to Art. 44 and 56quater
Non recoverable proportion of input tax determined in accordance with Art. 50
Non recoverable input tax in accordance with Art. 56ter-1(7) and 56ter-2(7) (when applying the margin scheme)
Adjustment of deductions in accordance with provisions of Art. 53
Adjustment of deductions in accordance with provisions of the grand-ducal Regulation of 7 March 1980 - option to tax land
(to be carried forward to point IV.B)
TAX TO BE PAID OR TO BE RECLAIMED
Renting/leasing of immovable property with VAT
Renting/leasing of immovable property with no VAT
Renting/leasing of installed equipment and machinery
Public and professional third party liability insurance
Cleaning and maintenance of business premises
Papers and periodicals for business purposes
Expenses for work carried out by sub-contractors
Expenses for other work carried out by third parties
Repair and maintenance of equipment and machinery
Assessment total of the taxable amount for non-business use of assets allocated to business
Book (net asset) value at the beginning of the financial year
Book (net asset) value at the end of the financial year
Total of expenses during the financial year
Non-business part of expenditures for motor vehicules (VAT excluded)
Supplies carried out within the scope of the special arrangement of art. 56sexies
Supplies carried out within the scope of the special arrangement
Services supplied by the declaring person as a registered taxpayer in Luxembourg
Services to be declared and taxed by the registered taxpayer in Luxembourg
Total entry of stock for business purposes
Not falling within the scope of Art. 56ter-1 and 56ter-2
Purchases of goods which give rise to a chargeable event for the supplier or for the taxable person acquiring the goods
Purchases of goods which don't give rise to a chargeable event neither for the supplier nor for the taxable person acquiring the goods
Purchases of goods abroad which are not brought to Luxembourg
Stock not falling within the scope
Payments made on account by clients (VAT excluded)
